entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Apsley
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 09:29 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of snow squalls. Blowing snow. Local amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 80. High minus 7. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 8.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of snow squalls. Blowing snow this evening. Local blowing snow overnight. Local amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
